code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./MessageBar.css';import config from'./config';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MessageBar(){const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const logMessageToServer=async message=>{try{const response=await fetch('http://samarth-ar10.com:8000/api/frontend_log',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({event_type:'user_message',message})});if(!response.ok){throw new Error(`HTTP error! Status: ${response.status}`);}}catch(error){console.error('Error logging message to server:',error);}};const handleSendMessage=()=>{if(message.trim()!==''){console.log('Message sent:',message);logMessageToServer(message);setMessage('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("footer",{className:"message-bar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{type:"text",id:"user-message",value:message,onChange:e=>setMessage(e.target.value),placeholder:"Type your message here..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"send-button",onClick:handleSendMessage,children:"Send"})]});}export default MessageBar;
